alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Clay; Jackson; Knott; Leslie; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Owsley, northwestern Leslie, northwestern Perry, southeastern Jackson, west central Knott, southwestern Breathitt and northern Clay Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Whick to Malcomb. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Watts, Wolf Coal, Whick, Little, Barwick, Altro, Bush Branch, Copland, Chavies and Saldee around 725 PM EDT. Ned and Lamont around 730 PM EDT. Hardshell and Taff around 735 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Rowdy, Dice, Noble, Ary, Spurlock, Brutus, Enline, Whoopflarea, Newfound, Jacks Creek, Mistletoe, Panco and Hector. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Clay; Jackson; Knott; Leslie; Owsley; Perry
